Text: Many thanks Snowhiter for this great series -- Sunday nights just won't be the same after this.
Cheers mate for all your hard work, excellent series. Much appreciated.

Just registered on TPB, for the sole point of adding my thanks to all the others. Excellent work. It's essentially a public service proving this sort of programming to countries which will never ever receive it via normal channels.
Thanks again from Phnom Penh - great work
a big, big thank u for posting the entire season III, with eng subs.
Thank you very very much for your fantastic work!!!

Goddamn!!!

Sorry for my language.
But, you'll know what I mean if you watch the final episode to the end.

Still the best drama in my life, period!!

There must be fouth season! please~~~~~

Now, I understand why capitalism doesn't work. :)))

Thanks for sharing this great drama, Snowhiter!

Thanx for the thanx everyone - and yep - nicely put zorb69 - thats why I'm quite specific regarding the programs I upload... I was hoping to upload Engrenages (Spiral S04) next but thats delayed - It'll be Borgen S02...
Thanks so much Snowhiter..... I always look forward to your excellent uploads.
OMG! The ending! They MUST be making series 4!! It cannot possibly end there!
Thank you Snowhiter ! This is one of the best serial I've ever watched.  I'm quite sure there will be part IV :P

Thanks Snowiter. As always, you provide a great service and especially when it comes to sub-titles. Any chance of getting a Danish series called Rejseholdet?  32 episodes from 2000 - 2004. Can't find it with hard coded subs anywhere and that seem to be the only subtitles I can get to work!
